description:
Piano With Willie offers lessons to all skill levels of piano players. Willie uses the Foundational / Fundational approach when creating his lessons. Build upon your technique and polish up your skills with our piano lessons. This is the place to start if you want to learn the basics of Blues & Boogie piano playing. I’ll teach you the “basic” shuffle groove and show you some licks to play over it. You’ll also learn about sliding and crushing notes. Neighbor chords and suspensions.

You will learn the blues form in this lesson. You will also learn scales and chords that will be used over the blues form. You will learn how to slide, crush and roll notes. You will learn to play several grooves and licks in the blues and boogie format.
title: Piano With Willie: Blues n' Boogie Vol. 1
